name: Badge
description: Round colored badge, typically used to show a number

props.name: label
props.description: Text to show inside the badge
props.note: Passing a label (undefined) will present a pimple badge

props.name: labelStyle
props.description: Additional styles for the badge label

props.name: onPress
props.description: Called when the badge is pressed

props.name: hitSlop
props.description: Defines how far a touch event can start away from the badge

props.name: borderWidth
props.description: Width of border around the badge

props.name: borderRadius
props.description: Radius of border around the badge

props.name: borderColor
props.description: Color of border around the badge

props.name: labelFormatterLimit
props.description: Receives a number from 1 to 4, representing the label's max digit length
props.note:
Beyond the max number for that digit length, a '+' will show at the end. 
If set to a value not included in LABEL_FORMATTER_VALUES, no formatting will occur. 
Example: labelLengthFormatter={2}, label={124}, label will present '99+'

props.name: customElement
props.description: Custom element to render instead of an icon

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Additional styles for the top container
